Plants make oxygen.
Oxygen is a gas which we need to breathe.
Humans get fruits and vegetables from plants.
Fire from burning wood is used for cooking and keeping us warm.
Wood from plants is used to make furniture.
The chairs and desks are made from wood provided by plants.
Cotton clothes are made from a plant.
Humans use trees to make shelters.
Some plants are used as medicine.
These plants contain things that can cure illness.
Paper is made from trees.
Wood pulp from trees is used to make paper.
